dataset_id: BOREAS AFM-02 Wyoming King Air 1994 Aircraft Sounding Data
title: BOREAS AFM-02 Wyoming King Air 1994 Aircraft Sounding Data
summary: Parameters include wind direction, wind speed, west wind component (u), south wind component (v), static pressure, air dry bulb temperature, potential temperature, dewpoint, temperature, water vapor mixing ratio, and CO2 concentration.
